content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; furnace_source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warning: "no ingredients to smelt"; fuel inventory contains 2 units of coal and furnace_result holds 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs; status: NO_POWER; research set to automation; electrical_id: 7152.
- ElectricityGroup (id=7152) connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points: (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; fluid_box holds approximately 200 units of water at 15°; connection points: (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output point: (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_system updated to [25908].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; connection point: (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_system updated to [25908].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25908 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status: WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25909 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25910 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25915 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25914 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25919 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25918 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25921 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Incorrect Fluid System Identifier Usage in Connection Attempts:
  - Repeated connection attempts with fluid_system values (25564, 25607, 25650, 25693, 25736, 25779, 25822, 25865) failed as these identifiers were not present in the current pipeline network.
  - Verify and use the active fluid_system (now 25908, as configured on the boiler and offshore pump) before initiating connection operations.

• Ineffective Use of Fixed Delays for Pipeline Stabilization:
  - Relying on fixed 10-second delays without dynamic connectivity verification contributes to persistent connection failures.
  - Incorporate real-time checks to confirm pipeline readiness prior to retrying connection attempts.
